text: @realDonaldTrump Ventilators, is that your main concern? What about testing or giving the 69009 DEAD a proper burial. You have promised testing for 3 months yet there's almost nothing. The US has the most COVID-19 Cases and the most DEAD because you failed to act when you should have https://t.co/rCzEWOZGmC
